meanings.definition: Not arranged or systematized in a code or codes.
meanings.sent1: The uncodified documents were scattered and disorganized.
meanings.sent2: The uncodified rules caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: The uncodified recipe led to a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like uncodified puzzle pieces waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent5: The uncodified information was like a jumbled puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: Not codified; not arranged in a systematic code.
meanings.sent1: The uncodified laws created uncertainty in the community.
meanings.sent2: The uncodified language evolved naturally over time.
meanings.sent3: His uncodified approach to painting produced unique and vibrant artworks.
meanings.sent4: The uncodified traditions of the tribe were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The uncodified system of communication relied on gestures and expressions.
